title: Soccer Fever
synopsis: Together with the hero of this series, Brian Thompson an ex-reporter, we get to relive the great games of the Football World Cup.
staff: [['Motonaga, Keitarou', ['Episode Director']], ['Yamayoshi, Yasuo', ['Storyboard']], ['Takatou, Kazushige', ['Art Director']], ['Takeuchi, Kazuyoshi', ['Character Design']]]
